status.cursed.insomnia: You feel restless and can not sleep.
enchantment.cursed.blindness.desc: Drastically lowers the vision of the user.
enchantment.cursed.echo.desc: Causes random hostile mob sound effects to play.
enchantment.cursed.encumbrance.desc: Slows down the players attack speed.
enchantment.cursed.fading.desc: Causes the item to despawn faster when left on the ground.
enchantment.cursed.fragility.desc: Depletes the durability of the item at a faster rate.
enchantment.cursed.ignorance.desc: Breaking the wrong type of block will cause significantly more durability damage.
enchantment.cursed.midas.desc: Replaces block and mob loot with gold nuggets.
enchantment.cursed.misfortune.desc: Significantly lowers the luck of the user.
enchantment.cursed.obedience.desc: Only the first user will be able to use the item.
enchantment.cursed.radiance.desc: Causes the wearer to glow brightly and be visible through blocks.
enchantment.cursed.silence.desc: Prevents the wearer from making sounds.
enchantment.cursed.sinking.desc: Causes the wearer to sink rapidly in water.
